description: Only available for Brazil sellers. This API is only available for orders/parcels which are fulfilled by seller's logistics (or "Logística do Vendedor"), or logistic_channel_id: 90021. OFG status can be updated to - Shipped (pickup_done) - Delivered (delivery_done) - Delivery Failed (delivery_failed) (Do not allow passing tracking number &/or tracking URL without status update to logistic_pickup_done)

query.name: booking_sn
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://open.admin.uat.shopee.io/api/v2/logistics/get_booking_shipping_parameter?access_token=access_token&booking_sn=201214JASXYXY6&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: response
schema.description: Detail information you are querying.

schema.name: info_needed
schema.description: The parameters required based on each specific booking to Init. Must use the fields included under info_needed to call Init.

schema.name: dropoff
schema.description: Could contain 'branch_id', 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'branch_id', choose one to Init. If it contains 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include "dropoff" field in Init API.

schema.name: pickup
schema.description: Could contain 'address_id' and 'pickup_time_id'. Choose one address_id and its corresponding pickup_time_id to Init. If it has empty value, developer should still include "pickup" field in Init API.It could contains "tracking_number" returned from "info_need"for some channels, please also add it when init.

schema.name: pickup
schema.description: Logistics information for pickup mode booking.

schema.name: address_list
schema.description: List of available pickup address info.

schema.name: address_id
schema.description: The identity of address.

schema.name: region
schema.description: The region of specify address.

schema.name: state
schema.description: The state of specify address.

schema.name: city
schema.description: The city of specify address.

schema.name: district
schema.description: The district of specify address.

schema.name: town
schema.description: The town of specify address.

schema.name: address
schema.description: The address description of specify address.

schema.name: zipcode
schema.description: The zipcode of specify address.

schema.name: address_flag
schema.description: The flag of shop address, applicable values: default_address, pickup_address, return_address, current_address(only for multi-warehouse sellers)

schema.name: time_slot_list
schema.description: List of pickup_time information corresponding to the address_id. Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

schema.name: date
schema.description: The date of pickup time. In timestamp.

schema.name: time_text
schema.description: The text description of pickup time. Only applicable for certain channels.

schema.name: pickup_time_id
schema.description: The identity of pickuptime.

schema.name: flags
schema.description: This field will have the value “recommended” for the time slot that Shopee suggests sellers choose. While it is advisable for sellers to choose the recommended time slot, they can also choose other time slots that do not have the recommended flag.

schema.name: error
schema.description: return if error getting pickup time, otherwise omitted

schema.name: msg
schema.description: return if error getting pickup time, otherwise omitted
